title: Calculator
desc: A user-friendly calculator that supports both basic arithmetic operations and advanced functions such as square root, trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan), and more. Designed with a clean interface for efficient and accurate calculations.

title: Quiz
desc: An interactive quiz app that fetches questions from an API and tests your knowledge with multiple-choice questions. Features smooth navigation and dynamic question rendering.

title: To Do List
desc: A clean and minimal task manager that helps you organize your day. Add, edit, and check off tasks with a simple, responsive interface designed for productivity.
